CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 11, 1966, pg. 4, reads: "NAACP PICKETS U. S. STEEL MAIN HEADQUARTERS - As the national, state and local levels of NAACP picketed U. S. Steel Corp.'s main headquarters building at Fifth Ave. and William Penn Way, Downtown, Monday..."
TitMainTitle: Herbert Hill holding sign reading "Down! with Tokenism, Equal Job Opportunities for all..." leading picketers against segregation at U. S. Steel Building on Grant Street, opposite Union Trust Building, Downtown Pittsburgh
